description:
Mahmut used the business he started in Aryiros to set off a chain of events to pit Venedik against Balt-Rhein. In order to expand the number of nations against the Empire, Mahmut and his team head to Regatul Urado which has been closed off for 400 years. However, King Zsigmond III is proud of his nation`s independence, and tells Mahmut he will not be able to achieve his goal here.
Source: Amazon
